FILE: cm211265v11.0.txt
DYAD: BELGIUM - E. GERMAN
RIVALRY: RIV508
DISPUTE(S): MID2855 

PS-LAST-CHANGED: 20180212
PS-LAST-CHECKED: 20180213

Territorial-Maritime-Boundary Issues Variables

MID2855 

TERRMID: MID2855 3 -- not territory 
TERRMID-CER: MID2855 1 -- certain 
TERRMID-NOTES: MID2855 from Gibler (2018), in 1958, East Germany forced down a NATO jet owned by Belgium that flew into East Germany's airspace. Coded not territory because these countries were not disputing a border. 

TERRLINK: MID2855 3 -- not third party link to territory 
TERRLINK-CER: MID2855 1 -- certain 
TERRLINK-NOTES: 

MARITMID: MID2855 3 -- not maritime 
MARITMID-CER: MID2855 1 -- certain 
MARITMID-NOTES: 

ISLMID: MID2855 3 -- not islands 
ISLMID-CER: MID2855 1 -- certain 
ISLMID-NOTES: 

CIVWARMID: MID2855 3 -- not civil war 
CIVWARMID-CER: MID2855 1 -- certain 
CIVWARMID-NOTES:

CIVWARLINK: MID2855 3 -- not civil war link 
CIVWARLINK-CER: MID2855 1 -- certain 
CIVWARLINK-NOTES: 

COUPMID: MID2855 3 -- not coup 
COUPMID-CER: MID2855 1 -- certain 
COUPMID-NOTES: 

COUPLINK: MID2855 3 -- not coup link
COUPLINK-CER: MID2855 1 -- certain 
COUPLINK-NOTES:
